body.name: Avalon Organics Gel Cream Moisturizer with Vitamin C, 1.7 Oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 19 hrs 38 mins
features: One 1.7 oz. jar of Avalon Organics Natural Vitamin C Gel Cream Moisturizer
Lightweight gel cream to use morning and night; Dermatologist tested, suitable for sensitive skin
Certified organic formula made with plant-based botanicals and essential oils
No GMOs, parabens, harsh preservatives, synthetic colors or fragrances, phthalates or sulfates
Always cruelty-free, never tested on animals; recognized by the Leaping Bunny Program
body.description: Hydrate. Brighten. Replenish. This lightweight gel cream is infused with our unique Triple-C Complex, Olive Squalane, Kakau Plum, Turmeric, Licorice Root, and Milk Thistle to give your skin a soft, smooth finish. Powered by Vitamin C, this formula will help rejuvenate your skin and impart a radiant glow.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Deep Rooted Beauty Curated from nature’s pure resources, Avalon Organics NSF organic certified skin care, hair care and bath & body products are deep-rooted in a profound respect for the earth. Combining modern science with the botanical world, we constantly strive to perfect each formula, evolve expertise and deliver innovation. Searching out the beautifying benefits hidden within each plant, Avalon Organics thoughtfully develops formulas to not only nourish the body, but also nourish the mind and the soul.

Driven by a dedication to organic agriculture and formula transparency, all Avalon Organics products are certified to the NSF/ANSI 305 Standard for Personal Care Products Containing Organic Ingredients*. Through this honest, transparent process, the Avalon Organics brand creates products that are safe, effective and conscious of the greater good. *Claim approval was given on April 11, 2011 from QAI with certificate ID C01655324-NSF3HNPC-5.

Humbled by a profound respect for all living beings, Avalon Organics products are vegan and cruelty-free.* The Avalon Organics brand never tests products on animals, and will only source ingredients that the supplier can document are not tested on animals. This commitment to kindness is represented by the leaping bunny logo that appears on product labels. *Cruelty free certified by the CCIC on October 1st, 2008

Wrinkle Therapy Cleansing Oil Wrinkle Therapy Firming Body Lotion Wrinkle Therapy Facial Serum Wrinkle Therapy Day Crème More Better-For-You Skin Care Products from Avalon Organics Our plant-based face cream is infused with Co-Enzyme Q10 and rosehip oil, which are rich in skin-replenishing lipids, vitamins and antioxidants, to awaken skin and help counteract the visible signs of aging. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Rich and creamy
reviews.reviewText: I put it on after a shower. Moisturizes nicely. Contains vitamin c

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Vitamin C serum!
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love the Avalon Organic brand! The serum soaks in quickly with a silky finish . Feels like a primer.I use their body lotion, the lemon clarifying shampoo, and a vitamin C facial cleanser as well. I have loved all of their products!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Only thing I put on my face
reviews.reviewText: I work outside everyday in the sun, wind & cold all year long and spend a lot of time in our pool in the summer. The chlorine & elements from weather at work dry my face out so I use this vitamin C product for skin to keep my face looking healthy & repair damage from sun. I've used this face cream for years but it seems much thicker than usual and more greasy than the original formula I'm used to but still nice if you have dryer skin or get a lot of sun. Not recommended for super oily skin. There is an oil free formula but can't seem to find that one easily anymore. Product came brand new & unopened & was not tampered with. I use this on my face everyday but recommend using it mostly at night not before going anywhere because it does turn the skin a bit red at first & makes your face feel hot for little while but that's just the ingredients doing their work! The redness goes away after about an hour. It's not so bad that you can't go in public. The redness is not super drastic. It appears like a sunburn or makes me look like I'm having a hot flash for awhile then it goes away. Once the hot feeling goes away my skin appears younger, smoother, softer & healthier. I don't use anything else on my face other than the sunscreen version & I don't wear foundation or any makeup on my face except for mascara & eyeliner. I'm 45yrs old & get complimented on my skin &nice complexion all the time. I don't have many wrinkles for my age or for someone who works in the sun. I give partial credit to this product & partially to being fortunate to inherit nice skin from my mother & grandmother. I definitely notice a difference in my skin from this face cream though, my face looks younger than the skin anywhere else on my body I wish I could afford to use this as a full body lotion! This formula does leave more shine on my face than the oil free formula so I'm definitely switching back soon as I can. I'll just use this thicker formula on my neck & chest. It has a great orange citrus scent. I swear by this stuff for my face, but I do not have oily or sensitive skin so I can't say for other skin types. It is getting more expensive & comes in a smaller size than before but what isn't these days.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars But C moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: I love this moisturizer. I’ve been using it, for several years. It feels, and smells wonderful. Fresh and citrusy. People comment on how good my skin looks and feels.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars BUYER BEWARE! Containers Less Than Half Full!
reviews.reviewText: BUYER BEWARE! Containers Less Than Half Full!I've been buying this fantastic moisturizer in person from stores for well over a decade. It's non-toxic, a little goes a long way without being heavy or greasy, I never need to reapply unless I wash my face so it's very effective and awesome in every way. It used to be a cream but they've changed it into a "gel cream"... at first I was resistant to switching. But the former version is no longer made, so I tried the gel cream, expecting to be unsatisfied... I was pleasantly surprised to find that it works just as well. And it should smell like oranges and nothing musty or moldy or rancid. Any jars that have a funky smell are literally long expired and rancid product - so people SHOULD NEVER PUT ANY PRODUCT IN THAT TOXIC STATE ON THEIR SKIN. PERIOD. Trust your nose!HOWEVER, due to my longterm experience with this product, I know these containers are supposed to not only smell like fresh oranges (and no other smells) but they are also supposed to be filled to the very top of the rim, and the container should have a tamper safe seal (usually a shrunken plastic wrap around the jar). If there isn't one, it's definitely been tampered with. When I opened this jar, it was unsealed and it was less than half full. (RED FLAGS!) Seeing all the other reviews, it's clear that something nefarious is going on. I have my suspicions as to why these aren't sealed or full to the rim, but those statements were not allowed so I had to modify my review. Therefore, you'll have to use your imagination about what the problem is if other orders of this moisturizer arrive half empty and/or smelling funky. Funky smells indicate a product has expired and is now toxic, even if it 'looks' fine.Receiving less than half of what I paid for is infuriating... potentially gross, too. Needless to say, I sent it back for a refund.I can only hope that it will be sold in stores again so I can continue using it, as I don't trust what I'll get from online anymore. Otherwise I'll have to deal with the misery of trial and error in the quest to find something that 1. doesn't mess with my skin (95% of skincare products do) and 2. that does as good of a job as this has for about 15 years. I'm wishing us all luck!
